title: International Wire Transfer Processing Failure
description: International wire transfer processing halted due to compliance engine deadlock. High-value transfers were stuck, impacting enterprise customers and causing regulatory breaches.

root_cause.primary_cause: Compliance validation engine deadlock during sanctions list update.
contributing_factors: Database locks cascading to dependent services

immediate_actions: Bypassed sanctions check with manual review process.
Processed stuck transactions in priority order.
Engaged external compliance auditor for screening.
Established a war room with key stakeholders.
preventive_measures: Asynchronous sanctions list updates during low-traffic periods.
Circuit breaker pattern for compliance service.
Regulatory reporting automation for breach notifications.
